ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides a collection of utilities that allow programming with  R's operators. Routines allow classifying operators,  translating to and from an operator and its underlying function, and inverting  some operators (e.g. comparison operators), etc. All methods can be extended to custom infix operators.

Provides a collection of utilities that allow programming with  R's operators. Routines allow classifying operators,  translating to and from an operator and its underlying function, and inverting  some operators (e.g. comparison operators), etc. All methods can be extended to custom infix operators.

name: r-operator.tools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-operator.tools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/operator.tools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/operator.tools/operator.tools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ef811a3b42820026361cf13ba47031281205f0dff6c2ec7fadb61cd2dd91bec9

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('operator.tools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('operator.tools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/decisionpatterns/operator.tools
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: 'Provides a collection of utilities that allow programming with  R''s operators. Routines allow classifying operators,  translating to and from an operator and its underlying function, and inverting  some operators (e.g. comparison operators), etc. All methods can be extended to custom infix operators. '
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
